title: Putin Oversees Test Firing of Ballistic Missiles – Kremlin
description: The drills come hours after Russia moved to revoke its ratification of a landmark nuclear test ban treaty.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Russia Says Recruited 385K Soldiers This Year
description: Moscow has launched an aggressive recruitment campaign, offering huge salaries and welfare programs in a bid to recruit soldiers for its assault.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: ​​Russia Issues Arrest Warrant for Anti-War Street Artist Philippenzo
description: In September, police detained Filipp Kozlov for “politically motivated vandalism,” after which he fled the country.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Catholic Church in Russia Condemns Memorial Removal
description: Authorities recently removed the memorial to Lithuanian archbishop Mecislovas Reinys, who was imprisoned as part of Joseph Stalin's Great Terror.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: 15% of Russians Who Fled War, Mobilization Have Returned – Survey
description: “For many people, the quality of life is declining [abroad],” a researcher told the Financial Times.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Russia Refuses to Designate Hamas a Terrorist Group – Mozhem Obyasnit
description: Authorities said that labeling Hamas as a terrorist group is possible “only when a court verdict confirming unlawful acts comes into force.”
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Russia Says Trade With China Set to Surpass $200Bln Target in 2023
description: The acting head of Russia’s Customs Service said Russian-Chinese trade increased by 27% year-on-year between January and September.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Freed Ukrainian Captives Stranded at Russia-Georgia Border – Meduza
description: The men have been sleeping on the checkpoint's floor for two weeks, with volunteers bringing them food and water.

album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Tatarstan Head Awards Kadyrov’s Son After Row Over Detainee Beating
description: The award was presented in recognition of the younger Kadyrov's “contribution to strengthening interethnic and interfaith peace and harmony.”

title: Kremlin to Raffle Apartments, Trips to Boost Putin’s Popularity Ahead of 2024 Election – Meduza
description: Winners will receive 30 housing certificates valued at 5 million rubles ($53,500) each and 300 trips across Russia, among other prizes.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Russia Says U.S. Must End 'Hostility' for Nuclear Talks
description: Deputy Foreign Minister Sergei Ryabkov said Moscow had received an informal memo from the U.S. calling for renewed dialogue, but that talks were out of the question for now.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Volga River Drops to 37-Year Low in Southern Russia
description: Low water levels have led to once-submerged objects appearing above the water, such as a sunken icebreaker built in England in the late 19th century.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Russian Defense Minister Orders Winter Readiness in Visit to Frontline
description: Shoigu was briefed about preparations for winter combat, signaling Moscow's determination to continue waging its now 21-month-long war into next year.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
